explains: v. 区别；表现突出（distinguish 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Research suggests that babies learn to see by distinguishing between areas of light and dark.
sentences.cn: 研究显示婴儿是通过区分明亮区域和黑暗区域来学会观看的。

sentences.en: Plants are also capable of distinguishing between different wavelengths of light.
sentences.cn: 植物也有能力区分不同波长的光。

sentences.en: Does your cat have any distinguishing marks?
sentences.cn: 你的猫有什么特殊标记吗？
